body_html:
Well-spotted -- I didn't turn up that issue in the search I did.

Reading through #12659, it looks like the issue is more subtle (and worse?) than what I've shown here -- NaNs are sometimes propagated and sometimes not, and it depends on the implementation you happen to get.

body:
Well-spotted -- I didn't turn up that issue in the search I did.

Reading through #12659, it looks like the issue is more subtle (and worse?) than what I've shown here -- NaNs are sometimes propagated and sometimes not, and it depends on the implementation you happen to get.
